type: Purchase of a warehouse with installation
department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: Natural Resources Canada is seeking a contractor for the supply, delivery, and installation of a prefabricated warehouse at the Saint-Gabriel-de-Valcartier forest site. The contractor must prepare the ground and pour a reinforced concrete slab on site. Additionally, the contractor shall install the warehouse, including its commissioning. The completed contract will be executed in fifteen weeks.
